languages.text: "Он знал секрет. Заклинание не от богов — такое, чья сила даже больше божественной. Оно родилось в неведомых глубинах неправильности, и вскоре после того, как первый смертный произнес его, мир перестал быть".

"He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."
languages.original_text: "Он знал секрет. Заклинание не от богов — такое, чья сила даже больше божественной. Оно родилось в неведомых глубинах неправильности, и вскоре после того, как первый смертный произнес его, мир перестал быть".

traits.locale_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin. Its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「秘密を知っていたのだ。呪文は聖なるものではなかったが…神々の力を凌いだ。不安定で得体の知れない深みで生まれ、人間が初めて対話してすぐ、惑星は失われてしまった」
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: 「秘密を知っていたのだ。呪文は聖なるものではなかったが…神々の力を凌いだ。不安定で得体の知れない深みで生まれ、人間が初めて対話してすぐ、惑星は失われてしまった」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “他知道那个秘密。那个咒语并非来自神明，因为它蕴含的力量超过了神明的力量。它诞生于神秘、深邃的无序之中，某位凡人第一次念出这个咒语之后，没过多久，整个世界便不复存在。”
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: “他知道那个秘密。那个咒语并非来自神明，因为它蕴含的力量超过了神明的力量。它诞生于神秘、深邃的无序之中，某位凡人第一次念出这个咒语之后，没过多久，整个世界便不复存在。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Il connaissait le secret. Le sortilège n'était pas d'origine divine. Son pouvoir surpassait celui des dieux mêmes. Il est né dans les profondeurs insondables de l'irrégularité, et dès qu'il a été prononcé par un mortel, le monde a péri. »
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: « Il connaissait le secret. Le sortilège n'était pas d'origine divine. Son pouvoir surpassait celui des dieux mêmes. Il est né dans les profondeurs insondables de l'irrégularité, et dès qu'il a été prononcé par un mortel, le monde a péri. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Conocía el secreto. El hechizo no tenía origen divino, pues su poder era superior al de los dioses. Nació en las misteriosas profundidades de la irregularidad, y poco después de que un mortal lo pronunciara por primera vez, el mundo dejó de existir».
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: «Conocía el secreto. El hechizo no tenía origen divino, pues su poder era superior al de los dioses. Nació en las misteriosas profundidades de la irregularidad, y poco después de que un mortal lo pronunciara por primera vez, el mundo dejó de existir».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Er kannte das Geheimnis. Der Zauber war nicht göttlichen Ursprungs, seine Kraft hat die der Götter noch übertroffen. Er wurde in den mysteriösen Tiefen der Irregularität geboren, und kurz, nachdem ein Sterblicher ihn erstmals ausgesprochen hat, war die Welt nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: "Er kannte das Geheimnis. Der Zauber war nicht göttlichen Ursprungs, seine Kraft hat die der Götter noch übertroffen. Er wurde in den mysteriösen Tiefen der Irregularität geboren, und kurz, nachdem ein Sterblicher ihn erstmals ausgesprochen hat, war die Welt nicht mehr."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Sırrı biliyordu. Büyü, ilahi kaynaklı değildi. Gücü tanrılarınkinden bile üstündü. Düzensizliğin gizemli derinliklerinde doğmuştu. Bir ölümlü ilk kez dile getirdikten sonra o sözcük, varoluştan silindi."
languages.original_text: "He knew the secret. The spell was not of divine origin — its power surpassed that of the gods. It was born in the mysterious depths of irregularity, and soon after a mortal first uttered it, the world was no more."

traits.locale_text: "Sırrı biliyordu. Büyü ilahi kaynaklı değildi, gücü tanrılarınkini bile geride bırakıyordu. Düzensizliğin gizemli derinliklerinde doğmuştu ve bir ölümlü ilk kez dile getirdikten sonra o sözcük varoluştan silindi."
traits.speaker: Chief
